Package org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3.file

Class ImplicitFileColumnsHandler

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3.file.ImplicitFileColumnsHandler
public class ImplicitFileColumnsHandler extends Object
Manages implicit columns for files and partition columns for directories. Splits the work into a schema-time implicit column resolver, and a run-time class to populate the resulting vectors.

Uses system/session options for the configured name of the implicit columns.
